volonteers.name: Idil Abes
volonteers.description: Hello! I’m Idil. I am 20. I am studying in department of law in Turkey, Istanbul. This is my first experience in project like this one so I am pretty excited about working and spending time with other volunteers. I love team projects and doing something together. Also I liked Macedonia and Skopje. This city has great nature and statues. I wonder how we will work and spending amazing time with others when I meet with new people from other cultures.
